CustomField.description: Examples: 1) Amount__c 2) Amount__c, Color__c ASC 3) Amount__c NULLS LAST, Color__c DESC NULLS LAST
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Only applicable when using the Concatenate, Concatenate Distinct, Last and First aggregate operations. Supports multiple fields (comma separated) with optional ASC/DESC and/or NULLS FIRST/LAST.
CustomField.label: Field to Order By
